entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -0.5°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 67 %

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers or flurries beginning in the morning and ending near noon then 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
